mapper.select: select * from sys_psl.v_unitidToBeamSplit where createtime>=TO_DATE(#{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND createtime<TO_DATE(#{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')+1

select count(*) from sys_psl.v_unitidToBeamSplit where 1=1
and lothead= #{keyWord}
